mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVL(L.like_count, 0) like_count, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count, INSTR(b.CONTENT, 'img') imageCheck, M.PROFILE profile FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) like_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_LIKE_TB GROUP BY BOARDNO) L ON L.BOARDNO = B.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'STATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO WHERE B.TYPE = 'BOARD001' AND B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' AND M.LOCATIONNO = #{LOCATIONNO} ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
